    Interface for reporters.

    • Method Detail

      • getReportWriter

        ReportWriter getReportWriter()
        Get report writer.
        Returns:
        Report writer associated with this reporter or null.

      • setReportWriter

        void setReportWriter(ReportWriter reportWriter)
        Set report writer.
        Parameters:
        reportWriter - SReporter to be associated with this generator.

      • getReportReader

        ReportReader getReportReader()
        Get report reader.
        Returns:
        Report reader from associated report writer or null.

      • fatal

        Put fatal error message.
        Parameters:
        id - Message id (may be null).
        msg - Message text.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null .

      • putReport

        void putReport(Report report)
        Put report. Type of report may be WARNING, ERROR or FATAL (see Report.getMsgID()).
        Parameters:
        report - The report.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR.

      • putReport

        void putReport(SPosition pos,
               Report report)
        Put report at position.
        Parameters:
        pos - Source position.
        report - The report.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR.

      • putReport

        void putReport(char type,
               java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String msg)
        Put report. Type of report may be WARNING, ERROR or FATAL (see Report.getMsgID()).
        Parameters:
        type - Type of report.
        id - Identifier of message (may be null).
        msg - Default text of report.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR .

      • putReport

        void putReport(char type,
               java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String msg,
               java.lang.String modification)
        Put report. Type of report may be WARNING, ERROR or FATAL (see Report.getMsgID()).
        Parameters:
        type - Type of report.
        id - Identifier of message (may be null).
        msg - Default text of report.
        modification - Modification string or null.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR.

      • putReport

        void putReport(SPosition pos,
               char type,
               java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String msg,
               java.lang.String modif)
        Put message with modification parameters.
        Parameters:
        pos - Source position.
        type - Type of report.
        id - Message id (may be null).
        msg - Message text.
        modif - Modification string (may be null).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if reporter is null and if report type is FATAL, ERROR or LIGHTERROR.

      • checkAndThrowErrors

        void checkAndThrowErrors()
        Check error reports stored in reporter specified by argument. Return in no errors are found, otherwise throw exception with list of error messages (max. MAX_REPORTS messages).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if errors has been generated.

      • getErrorCount

        int getErrorCount()
        Get number of errors.
        Returns:
        Number of errors.

      • errors

        boolean errors()
        Return true if and only if errors or fatal errors or light errors were generated.
        Returns:
        true if an error occurred.

      • errorWarnings

        boolean errorWarnings()
        Check if errors, light errors or warnings were generated.
        Returns:
        true if errors or warnings occurred.
